Text: once you decompress the files how do you burn the disk?
To reply to sczahra, you need to use a program that's able to burn disc images (Nero, Imgburn etc) and have a disc drive that can write to a disc.
Agree'd - ImgBurn is the way to go (plus its free)
Or you could use a torrented version of Nero 6 and use a keygen like I did, it doesn't fuss about what DVD I use.
DVD Decrypter works very good too, burned mine and worked great till disc got lost in move. Thanks for upload
